extendedInfo.description: Beautiful realistic water live wallpaper. Touch a screen of your phone to make ripples and waves. Enjoy watching the water movement.* Realistic water live wallpaper that reacts to touch* Touch the screen to add water drops and cause ripples * Move your finger and make virtual water waves* Select background from a set of beautiful built-in photos* Custom background option so you can choose a photo from your own gallery* Water simulation performance/quality control* Automatic water drops option to simulate rain * 100% free and without ads!To enable the wallpaper, go to:Home screen -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers -> Real Water Live WallpaperRemember, the higher the quality, the more battery it consumes.If you run into any problems, please send me an email. If you have an idea for a new feature, please let me know !

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Exactly what I wanted.  I do wish there was a way to pic which portion of your photo (crop which part of custom pic) you want as background
reviews.author: Kate Myers

reviews.title: One request
reviews.comment: This is the most realistic watery live wallpaper for android !! , but I have a request: can you make it to support multi-touch, that would be more fun and more realistic. Thanks in advance!!!

reviews.title: Love it..
reviews.comment: But it used to work in lanscape mode, Eversince whenever it got updated a while ago..it hasnt seemed work in lanscape mode.. I have an LG androide eclypse btw. Please fix it, this was my favourite live wallpaper, I will give it 5 out of 5 stars then :))

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This is the best water drop wallpaper I\'ve seen... You can even customize For FREE the background. It would be the perfect one if I was able to choose which part of the picture I want to see in the background but Not all in life is perfect....
reviews.author: Edwin Ramos Reyes

reviews.title: Awsooooooomely Great
reviews.comment: I agree with Kate but, I am sure someone has already suggested this to make a copy of the picture and crop it exactly like you want it for your screen and Viola Perfectamundo! The perfect screen, screen thing.  Thank you creators for being such drips, I mean that in the best, most respectful way. Like Arnold said \"Dis is a  goud one\"  RickS
reviews.author: Rick Saunders

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is just what I was looking for. I agree with Kate that a crop feature would be nice to have. However I can live without since this live wallpaper is perfect, I have installed even purchased others and nothing did what I wanted like this one does. It runs and looks amazing on my Galaxy Note 2. If it wasn\'t free I would definitely purchase this one (Big thanks for having no ads!). Thanks for this great live wallpaper app!!!
reviews.author: Mike Heonis

reviews.title: Awesome App so far!
reviews.comment: A little cumbersome to adjust settings because there is no icon in app drawer -- -> Go to your home screen -> Push the menu button (or open Settings) -> Choose Wallpaper -> Live wallpaper -> Choose Water Drops Real.  (There is an icon on the home page, but if you delete it, it\'s hard to find)  Once you figure that out, it\'s great.  Effects are top notch and the #2 graphics setting looks real.  I\'m curious to see if there\'s any battery drain.  The last one I used did not seem to affect battery at all and this looks to use the same effects.  I like this better because I can use my own pictures or several of the included ones (as opposed to only using the ONE with the other wallpaper).  Nice job.  I\'ll be back later to update if it affected the battery life or not.         One minor wish - it would be even better if the effect worked on the lock screen, too!
reviews.author: Chad Portenga
